============================================================================= *mineMS2*: Annotation of spectral libraries with exact fragmentation patterns =============================================================================
----------- Description -----------
This vignette describes the use of the *mineMS2* software (Delabriere *et al.*, submitted) coupled to the GNPS MS/MS molecular networking methodology (Watrous *et al.*, 2012). In this example, the molecular network has been precomputed on the GNPS website and extracted in the *.graphML* format (file *ex_gnps_network.graphml* inside the *dataset* subdirectory of the _mineMS2_ installation folder). We strongly recommend to compute the patterns and the GNPS network on the same .mgf file to avoir matching issues.

----------------- Workflow position -----------------
This tool is dedicated to the annotation of MS/MS spectra.
----------- Input files -----------
+---------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +===========================+============+ | 1) Set of MS2 spectra | mgf | +---------------------------+------------+ | 2) GNPS molecular network | graphml | +---------------------------+------------+
.. class:: warningmark
VERY IMPORTANT: We strongly recommend that the GNPS network was computed on the same mgf file as the one used in this tool, to avoid matching issues.
---------- Parameters ----------
Motif intensity, Proportion of spectra threshold; (default = 7) | Only motifs with at least X% of intensity in at least Y spectra will be kept. |
------------ Output files ------------
spectra.mgf | All MS2 spectra as a single mgf file. |
network.graphml | GNPS molecular network as a graphml file. We strongly recommend that the GNPS network was computed on the same spectra.mgf file as above. This network can be visualized in Cytoscape (note that the GraphML format is supported by Cytoscape 3: select 'File > Import > Network from file'; with Cytoscape 2, the GraphMLReader plugin is needed): |
figure.pdf | Visualization of the detected patterns and their occurences in the MS2 spectra. |
information.txt | Text file with all messages and warnings generated during the computation. |
